title: No Blood Moon Diana?
body:
Blood Moon Shen
Blood Moon Akali
Blood Moon Kalista
Blood Moon Thresh
Blood Moon Elise

So we have the whole team now and it makes me think Riot really missed an opportunity here. What were the reasons for not making Blood Moon Diana?

I hope Riot actually make Arcade Riven, that would be another missed opportunity.

replies.body:
Wait a second......

Menstrual comes from the greek "menus" which means moon.

the word "month" also comes from various languages with a root word of "moon", because of the lunar cycle, once monthly.

[So "blood moon" can only mean one thing...](http://illuminatisymbols.info/wp-content/uploads/illuminati-symbols-eye.jpg)

hidden word is steak.

shen thresh elise akali kalista
INB4 It was actually legit xd

I agree Blood Moon Diana could have been better than Blood Moon Thresh and Blood Moon Elise (they seem really random choices, besides the fact 3 Shadow Isles champs got the skin.) But Arcade Riven is pure stupidity.

> Arcade Riven? Why exactly that theme? I'd personally like Frosted {{champion:92}} with an Icicle Blade

One of the things that keeps coming up about Riven whenever Riot talk about her play style is what type of champion they wanted to make, a combo champion that reminded them of arcade fighting games and made players feel like they were playing one in League.
Arcade Riven? Why exactly that theme? I'd personally like Frosted {{champion:92}} with an Icicle Blade
